displayed_text: Patient: What’s the number? Doctor: Excellent. Healthcare Professional: Can you repeat that again? I’m sorry. Family Member: Hum? Healthcare Professional: Can you repeat that? Family Member: Yes. (Patient gives phone number.) Healthcare Professional: Okay. Doctor: Beautiful. Okay. Need any refills on anything? Patient: No. Doctor: Okay. So hang on and watch out for the uh yeah uh the diet and we’ll see you back in six weeks. Piece of cake. Patient: Six weeks? Doctor: Sure. Is that legit? Are you going to behave for six weeks?
